$TTL 300
@ IN SOA ns1.example.com. admin.example.com. (
  1111111100; serial number
  3600; refresh [1h]
  600; retry [10m]
  86400; expire [1d]
  300); min TTL
;

example.com. 300 NS ns1.example.com.
config 300 A 127.0.0.201
dev 300 A 127.0.0.203
example.com. 300 A 127.0.0.203
example.com. 300 MX 10 mail.example.com.
example.com. 300 TXT "v=spf1 include:spf.mandrillapp.com include:amazonses.com include:sendgrid.net a mx ~all"
follow 300 A 127.0.0.202
follow 300 A 127.0.0.203
h1 300 A 127.0.0.201
h2 300 A 127.0.0.202
h3 300 A 127.0.0.203
login 300 A 127.0.0.201
mail 300 A 127.0.0.202
ns1 300 A 127.0.0.201

www 300 A 127.0.0.203

resources.resource: Application | infra_url_redirection_http-h1_example_com | Apache HTTP URL redirections for h1.example.com

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerName config.example.com
    ServerAlias config.example.com
    
    ErrorLog /var/log/apache2/config.example.com-error.log
    CustomLog /var/log/apache2/config.example.com-access.log combined
    
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /(.*) https://config.example.com/$1 [R,L]
</VirtualHost>

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerName login.example.com
    ServerAlias login.example.com
    
    ErrorLog /var/log/apache2/login.example.com-error.log
    CustomLog /var/log/apache2/login.example.com-access.log combined
    
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /(.*) https://login.example.com/$1 [R,L]
</VirtualHost>

global
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
  tune.ssl.default-dh-param 1024

defaults
  timeout connect 5000
  timeout client 600000
  timeout server 600000
  timeout tunnel 600000

frontend port_4433
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:4433 ssl crt /certs
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ https

  acl https_4433_config.example.com hdr(host) -i config.example.com
  acl https_4433_login.example.com hdr(host) -i login.example.com

  use_backend https_4433_config.example.com if https_4433_config.example.com
  use_backend https_4433_login.example.com if https_4433_login.example.com

frontend port_8080
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:8080
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ http

  acl http_8080_config.example.com hdr(host) -i config.example.com
  acl http_8080_login.example.com hdr(host) -i login.example.com

  use_backend http_8080_config.example.com if http_8080_config.example.com
  use_backend http_8080_login.example.com if http_8080_login.example.com

backend https_4433_config.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_config.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10003 check

backend https_4433_login.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_login.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10002 check

backend http_8080_config.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_config.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10000 check

backend http_8080_login.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_login.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10001 check

resources.resource: Application | infra_web-h3_example_com | Web HA Proxy for h3.example.com

global
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
  tune.ssl.default-dh-param 1024

defaults
  timeout connect 5000
  timeout client 600000
  timeout server 600000
  timeout tunnel 600000

frontend port_4433
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:4433 ssl crt /certs
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ https

  acl https_4433_dev.example.com hdr(host) -i dev.example.com
  acl https_4433_example.com hdr(host) -i example.com
  acl https_4433_www.example.com hdr(host) -i www.example.com

  http-request replace-header Origin https://dev.example.com(.*) http://dev.example.com\1 if https_4433_dev.example.com
  http-request replace-header Origin https://www.example.com(.*) http://www.example.com\1 if https_4433_www.example.com

  use_backend https_4433_dev.example.com if https_4433_dev.example.com
  use_backend https_4433_example.com if https_4433_example.com
  use_backend https_4433_www.example.com if https_4433_www.example.com

frontend port_8080
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:8080
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ http

  acl http_8080_example.com hdr(host) -i example.com

  use_backend http_8080_example.com if http_8080_example.com

backend https_4433_dev.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_dev.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10002 check

backend https_4433_example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10001 check

backend https_4433_www.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_www.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10003 check

backend http_8080_example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10000 check

#!/bin/bash

set -e

cp /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre/lib/ext/sunjce_provider.jar /james-server-app/lib/

cd /james-server-app
./bin/james start


PIDFILE="var/james.pid"

until [ -f $PIDFILE ]
do
	echo Waiting for $PIDFILE
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat $PIDFILE)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Service is down

<?xml version="1.0"?>

<mailrepositorystore>

   <mailrepositories>

       <!-- JDBC based repositories.  These repositories store all message data -->
       <!-- in the database. -->
       <mailrepository class="org.apache.james.mailrepository.jdbc.JDBCMailRepository">
           <protocols>
               <protocol>db</protocol>
           </protocols>
           <config>
               <sqlFile>file://conf/sqlResources.xml</sqlFile>
               <!-- Set the size threshold for in memory handling of storing operations -->
               <!-- Default is currently 409600000 due to a bug with mysql and binary stream -->
               <!-- currently under investigation. Please change this only if you know what -->
               <!-- you do. -->
               <!--
               <inMemorySizeLimit>4096</inMemorySizeLimit>
                -->
           </config>
       </mailrepository>

        <!-- File based repositories.  These repositories store all message data -->
        <!-- in the file system. -->
        <mailrepository class="org.apache.james.mailrepository.file.FileMailRepository">
            <protocols>
                <protocol>file</protocol>
            </protocols>
            <!-- Set if the messages should be listed sorted. False by default -->
            <config FIFO="false" CACHEKEYS="true"/>
        </mailrepository>
        
   </mailrepositories>
   
</mailrepositorystore>

# Java Application
wrapper.java.command=java
wrapper.working.dir=.

# Java Main class.  This class must implement the WrapperListener interface
#  or guarantee that the WrapperManager class is initialized.  Helper
#  classes are provided to do this for you.  See the Integration section

#  needed starting from 1

wrapper.java.classpath.2=../conf
wrapper.java.classpath.3=%REPO_DIR%/*
wrapper.java.classpath.4=../conf/lib/*

# Java Library Path (location of Wrapper.DLL or libwrapper.so)

wrapper.java.additional.8=-Dmail.mime.uudecode.ignoremissingbeginend=true

wrapper.java.additional.5=-Dmail.mime.multipart.ignoremissingboundaryparameter=true
wrapper.java.additional.4=-Dmail.mime.multipart.ignoremissingendboundary=true
wrapper.java.additional.3=-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false

wrapper.java.additional.1=-XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError

wrapper.java.initmemory=128

# Application parameters.  Add parameters as needed starting from 1
wrapper.app.parameter.1=org.apache.james.app.spring.JamesAppSpringMain
wrapper.app.parameter.2=start

#********************************************************************
# Wrapper Logging Properties
#********************************************************************
# Format of output for the console.  (See docs for formats)
wrapper.console.format=PM

# Log Level for console output.  (See docs for log levels)
wrapper.console.loglevel=INFO

# Log file to use for wrapper output logging.
wrapper.logfile=../log/wrapper.log

# Format of output for the log file.  (See docs for formats)
wrapper.logfile.format=LPTM

# Log Level for log file output.  (See docs for log levels)
wrapper.logfile.loglevel=INFO

# Maximum size that the log file will be allowed to grow to before
#  the log is rolled. Size is specified in bytes.  The default value
#  of 0, disables log rolling.  May abbreviate with the 'k' (kb) or
#  'm' (mb) suffix.  For example: 10m = 10 megabytes.
wrapper.logfile.maxsize=50M

# Maximum number of rolled log files which will be allowed before old
#  files are deleted.  The default value of 0 implies no limit.
wrapper.logfile.maxfiles=1

# Log Level for sys/event log output.  (See docs for log levels)
wrapper.syslog.loglevel=NONE

# Title to use when running as a console

#********************************************************************

# Service dependencies.  Add dependencies as needed starting from 1

# Allow the service to interact with the desktop.
wrapper.ntservice.interactive=false

<?xml version="1.0"?>

<mailetcontainer enableJmx="true">

  <context>
    <postmaster>postmaster@example.com</postmaster>
  </context>

  <spooler>
    <threads>20</threads>
  </spooler>

  <processors>

    <processor state="root" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="PostmasterAlias" />
      <mailet match="All" class="RecipientToLowerCase" />
      <mailet match="RelayLimit=30" class="Null" />

      <!-- Check if authenticated -->
      <mailet match="SMTPAuthSuccessful" class="SetMimeHeader">
        <name>X-UserIsAuth</name>
        <value>true</value>
      </mailet>

      
      <!-- Check recipient's redirections -->
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.ExactAndCatchAllRedirections">
        <cacheMaxTimeInSeconds>10</cacheMaxTimeInSeconds>
        <cacheMaxEntries>1000</cacheMaxEntries>
      </mailet>
      
      <!-- Local delivery -->
      <mailet match="RecipientIsLocal" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>localProcessor</processor>
      </mailet>

      <!-- Local delivery - The domain is managed locally, but the local mailbox does not exist -->
      <mailet match="HostIsLocal" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>localAccountDoesNotExistProcessor</processor>
        <notice>550 - Requested action not taken: no such user here</notice>
      </mailet>
      
      <!-- Outgoing -->
      <mailet match="com.foilen.james.components.matcher.HasHeaderGlobalAndSpecific=X-UserIsAuth" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>outgoingAuthProcessor</processor>
      </mailet>
      
      <mailet match="All" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>outgoingAnonymousProcessor</processor>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>

    <processor state="localProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.LogInfo">
        <text>localProcessor</text>
      </mailet>
      
      <mailet match="All" class="AddDeliveredToHeader" />
      <mailet match="All" class="LocalDelivery" />
    
    </processor>
    
    <processor state="outgoingAuthProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.LogInfo">
        <text>outgoingAuthProcessor</text>
      </mailet>
      
      <!-- Relay emails per domain to different gateways -->
      
      <mailet match="All" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>outgoingDirectRelayProcessor</processor>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>

    <processor state="outgoingDirectRelayProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
      <!-- Relay -->
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.LogInfo">
        <text>Remote delivery via the server directly (no gateway)</text>
      </mailet>
      <mailet match="All" class="RemoteDelivery">
        <outgoing>outgoing</outgoing>

        <delayTime>5000, 100000, 500000</delayTime>
        <maxRetries>25</maxRetries>
        <maxDnsProblemRetries>0</maxDnsProblemRetries>
        <deliveryThreads>10</deliveryThreads>
        <sendpartial>true</sendpartial>
        <bounceProcessor>bounceProcessor</bounceProcessor>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>
    
    <processor state="outgoingAnonymousProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.LogInfo">
        <text>outgoingAnonymousProcessor</text>
      </mailet>
      
      <!-- If is a redirection -> Send directly (since could be spam) -->
      <mailet match="com.foilen.james.components.matcher.HasHeaderGlobalAndSpecific=isRedirection" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>outgoingDirectRelayProcessor</processor>
      </mailet>
      
      <!-- If is not a redirection -> Deny -->
      <mailet match="All" class="ToProcessor">
        <processor>outgoingDeniedProcessor</processor>
        <notice>550 - Requested action not taken: relaying denied</notice>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>
    
    <processor state="localAccountDoesNotExistProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="com.foilen.james.components.mailet.LogInfo">
        <text>localAccountDoesNotExistProcessor</text>
      </mailet>
    
      <mailet match="All" class="Bounce">
        <attachment>none</attachment>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>

    <processor state="outgoingDeniedProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
        <mailet match="All" class="NotifyPostmaster">
          <sender>unaltered</sender>
          <attachError>true</attachError>
          <prefix>[RELAY-DENIED]</prefix>
          <passThrough>true</passThrough>
          <to>postmaster</to>
          <debug>true</debug>
        </mailet>

      <mailet match="All" class="Null" />
      
    </processor>

    <processor state="bounceProcessor" enableJmx="true">
    
        <mailet match="All" class="NotifyPostmaster">
          <sender>unaltered</sender>
          <attachError>true</attachError>
          <prefix>[BOUNCE]</prefix>
          <passThrough>true</passThrough>
          <to>postmaster</to>
          <debug>true</debug>
        </mailet>
      
        <mailet match="All" class="DSNBounce">
          <passThrough>true</passThrough>
        </mailet>
      
      <mailet match="All" class="Null" />
      
    </processor>
    
    <processor state="error" enableJmx="true">
    
      <mailet match="All" class="NotifyPostmaster">
        <sender>unaltered</sender>
        <attachError>true</attachError>
        <prefix>[ERROR]</prefix>
        <passThrough>false</passThrough>
        <to>postmaster</to>
        <debug>true</debug>
      </mailet>
      
    </processor>
    
  </processors>

</mailetcontainer>

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

#!/bin/bash

set -e

if [ -d /etc/php5 ]; then
	cd /etc/php5
	for SUB in $(ls); do
		if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
			cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
		fi
	done
fi

if [ -d /etc/php ]; then
	cd /etc/php
	for VER in $(ls); do
		cd /etc/php/$VER
		for SUB in $(ls); do
			if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
				cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
			fi
		done
	done
fi

<VirtualHost *>
  DocumentRoot /base/
  
  SetEnvIf x-forwarded-proto https HTTPS=on
  
  ErrorLog /var/log/apache2/error.log
  CustomLog /var/log/apache2/access.log combined
  
  <Directory /base/>
    AllowOverride All
    Require all granted
  </Directory>
  
  

</VirtualHost>

#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

#!/bin/bash

set -e

if [ -d /etc/php5 ]; then
	cd /etc/php5
	for SUB in $(ls); do
		if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
			cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
		fi
	done
fi

if [ -d /etc/php ]; then
	cd /etc/php
	for VER in $(ls); do
		cd /etc/php/$VER
		for SUB in $(ls); do
			if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
				cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
			fi
		done
	done
fi

<VirtualHost *>
  DocumentRoot /base/
  
  SetEnvIf x-forwarded-proto https HTTPS=on
  
  ErrorLog /var/log/apache2/error.log
  CustomLog /var/log/apache2/access.log combined
  
  <Directory /base/>
    AllowOverride All
    AuthType Basic
    AuthName "Restricted Content"
    AuthUserFile /htpasswd
    Require valid-user
  </Directory>
  
  

</VirtualHost>
